original_text: Then the king from the north will march south with his army. He will build up heaps of earth around the walls of a strong city. He will take the city for himself. The soldiers of the kingdom in the south will not be able to stop him. Even their best soldiers will not be strong enough to win the fight.
korean_text: 이에 북방 왕은 와서 토성을 쌓고 견고한 성읍을 점령할 것이요 남방 군대는 그를 당할 수 없으며 또 그가 택한 군대라도 그를 당할 힘이 없을 것이므로

sentences.original_text: Then the king from the north will march south
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 북쪽의 왕이 남쪽으로 행진할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will build up heaps of earth
around the walls of a strong city
He will take the city for himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 성을 자신을 위해 차지할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: The soldiers of the kingdom in the south
will not be able to stop him
